thread.title: Win a holiday in Kefalonia: Terms and Conditions
thread.title_full: Win a holiday in Kefalonia: Terms and Conditions - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a holiday in Kefalonia: Terms and Conditions
text: 1. This prize draw is open to residents of the UK, aged 18 years or over, except employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and its group companies (“Promoter”), Visit Greece and Sunvil International Sales Limited, their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw. 2. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. 3. Entries must be submitted by answering a question on www.telegraph.co.uk/greek holidays and entry is restricted to one per person. Once submitted, entries cannot be amended in any way. 4. Late, illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt entries or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of despatch will not be accepted as proof of receipt. The winner will be drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date. The winner’s name and county can be obtained by sending a sae Trip to Kefalonia Winners, SPARK, Telegraph Media Group, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT within one month after the closing date of the prize draw. 5. All entries must be received by 23.59 on 30 October 2015. 6. The winner will be contacted within 14 days of the closing date of the prize draw. Should the Promoter be unable to contact the winner or should the winner be unable to accept the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award the prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these terms and conditions. 7. The prize as described is available on the date of publication. Should the prize become unavailable, a substitute of equal value shall be provided. 8. One winning entrant will win a seven-night holiday to Kefalonia for two people. The prize package comprises: • Return economy-class flights from London Gatwick Airport or Manchester Airport to Kefalonia Airport • Seven nights’ accommodation in a 2-3* self-catered studio or apartment • Return transfers from the Kefalonia Airport to the accommodation 9. The prize must be taken as one package. 10. The prize does not include: domestic transfers; food and drink; personal expenditure; or incidental costs, other than where mentioned. It is the responsibility of the prizewinner and guest to ensure they have valid passports, health insurance and travel insurance and to obtain any necessary vaccinations and visas for their trip. 11. The prize is valid for travel from 7 May 2016 to 22 October 2016 and excludes the following dates: 28 May 2016 to 4 June 2016; 27 August 2016 to 3 September 2016; the Christmas and New Year period; Valentine’s Day; Easter, school and bank holidays. Once confirmed, the booking cannot be amended. The winner and their guest must travel together at all times. Sunvil International Sales Limited’s standard terms and conditions apply. 12. All elements of the prize are subject to availability, non transferable and there are no cash alternatives. 13. The winner may be required to participate in reasonable publicity on behalf of the Promoter and Sunvil International Sales Limited. 14. Entrants’ data will be used for the purpose of administration of this prize draw and in accordance with the permissions granted or withheld at the point of entry. 15. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prize impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter and accordingly the Promoter may at its absolute discretion vary or amend the promotion and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter as a result thereof. 16. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prize is the responsibility of Sunvil International Sales Limited. 17. These Terms and Conditions are to be interpreted in accordance with English law and any dispute arising out of these Terms or their subject matter is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT. Online Form - Win a holiday in Kefalonia: Terms and Conditions
